channel.title: Client Loading
channel.description: Hello I was wondering if anyone could help me with the loading speed on my client. I'm using Uncalled Attack which is a [PI] server. When I load the client it stays at 75% and loads for about 4 minutes. Please help me thanks!

item.title: Client Loading
item.dc:creator: @omarsoliman omarsoliman
item.description:
@omarsoliman wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:414606”][quote author=omarsoliman link=topic=516569.msg3751616#msg3751616 date=1316061137]
pack them
[/quote]

That won’t do anything. It is essentially the same as compressing them. Yes the overall cache size would be smaller, but it would actually increase the amount of time needed to process them (looking up the file, decompressing it, loading it into memory)[/quote]

your wrong cuz i just added 654 or what ever items and 602 npcs and gonna add 508 maps all of thats takes around 4 mins to unpack and then packed them it takes around 30 secs to unpack

Read full topic

item.title: Client Loading
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

omarsoliman:

pack them

That won’t do anything. It is essentially the same as compressing them. Yes the overall cache size would be smaller, but it would actually increase the amount of time needed to process them (looking up the file, decompressing it, loading it into memory)

Read full topic

item.description:
@omarsoliman wrote:

pack them

Read full topic

item.title: Client Loading
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:7, topic:414606”]Well that sucks, is there any way that that could be sent and read client sided?
Would that improve loading speed at all?[/quote]

Use the JAGGRAB protocol (which is essentially HTML modified) to get the files you need from the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Loading
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Well that sucks, is there any way that that could be sent and read client sided?
Would that improve loading speed at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Loading
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:5, topic:414606”]With my client it takes a long ass time to load after 80% due to all the “raw” data inside the cache, is there any way to reduce that?
Maybe compress them all into one file?[/quote]

No, the only thing that would do it reduce the overall cache size. The processing would still take the same amount of time.

Read full topic

codeman9909:

I wanna keep the items but I wanna reduce the loading speed

You can’t have both.
